short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: eSwap is an inventory and order management sofware for online retailers and wholesalers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inventory and Sales management for smart businesses

WHAT IS eSwap

eSwap is an Inventory and Sales Management software that gives you the power to manage inventory, sales orders, purchase orders, fulfillments as well as data & analytics from one central location. This is an innovative approach towards your inventory and stock management control as far as it allows you to avoid making manual updates from multiple sources all the time.

eSwap gives its users an innovative, user-friendly approach and access to their business control. It is time-consuming in terms of allowing businesses more of a concentration and focuses on more substantial aspects of their businesses

WHO SHOULD USE eSwap

eSwap permits you to fill the gap in the marketplace by giving expert solutions to your business management agenda. Whether your business is small or big it hands in smart inventory management tools with automated workflow practice. eSwap can allow you to reach your goals in a smart and time-saving manner.

CUSTOMER FEEDBACK

“Great support, lot of integrations and most important lot of automation rules. We are using eSwap last 6 months and it already helped us to grow our income by 30% with only changing our workflows and saving lot of time for us.”-Jason Smith
